05-04-2025.letter: We will have lows, sad days, but we will make it. Our kids will be proud of us my love. Let's be strong and hopeful babe
05-04-2025.note: You're my moon even on the darkest nights
05-04-2025.quote: Love is gentle, patient and kind

06-04-2025.letter: You mean everything to me my dear love
06-04-2025.quote: We will make it despite the storms

10-04-2025.letter:
Your presence means everything to me my love,
I love the way you held me and kissed me,
the way you assured me and calmed,
you did not make me feel like a failure,
thank you for holding her tight and so right,
I owe you a poem after my exams ðŸ©·
10-04-2025.note: Love is precious, kind and a home
10-04-2025.quote:
Sometimes love is like those gentle waves in the sea,
sometimes love is bright sun on a sunny day,
sometimes love is the moon on the darkest of nights,
for me it is you My Love
